description:
A guided CakePHP workshop demonstrating rapid application development workflow.

A practical overview of the CakePHP framework. Incorporating changes made and planned in the recently released CakePHP 1.3 beta, this session will be invaluable for existing CakePHP users to learn the best route for existing application migration, as well as an ideal start for anyone interested in PHP development, Rapid Application workflow, and the CakePHP framework itself.
title: CakePHP 1.3 Concept to Deployment
